name: Sunset Skies
description:
Having lost the love of his life, John is devastated. Becoming bitter and cold, he lives alone until a young girl claiming to be an angel shows up at his door.

Join John and River the angel-in-training as they travel through fantastical and mystical worlds to find the answer to Johnny's questions about life. 

Witness their journey to find peace under the Sunset Skies.
